title.rendered: Franchise Training + Fat Brain + Coloring Books

content.rendered:
Franchise Training

On Tuesday we started operations training for our new Walls of Books stores in West Chester, Ohio and Atchison, Kansas. Before Thursday is over we will cover topics such as the trade-in system, merchandising, marketing, financial advising, inventory management, and more!

Read Before You Watch

We have Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children and Hollow City available for $7.97 and $6.97, respectively. Read the books before the movie hits theaters on September 30!

Fat Brain Toys

Have you seen our selection of Fat Brain Toys? Bright, colorful, high-quality, and perfect for developing minds and motor skills. Come to our stores and explore the numerous products for different age groups.

Adult Coloring Books

Fall into some creativity and relaxation. Explore fantasy landscapes, contour a rose, and shade in a horse of a different color with our adult coloring books. Available at all four Gottwals Books locations.

Save

Save

Save
